dict.acceptation: 定居的，常驻的；[计]常驻的，常存于内存中的；[动]不迁徙的（鸟兽等）；固有的，内在的；
居民；（旅馆的）住宿者；住院医师；

sent.orig: Article 2 Enterprises are classified into resident and non-resident enterprises.
sent.trans: 第二条企业分为居民企业和非居民企业。

sent.orig: Resident Education Committee meets monthly to discuss program issues program improvement and resident performance.
sent.trans: 住院医生培训委员会每月开会讨论课程漏洞，改进方法和住院医生表现。

sent.orig: Working as a Resident Assistant resident assistant in student housing is one way and an education.
sent.trans: 在学生宿舍做居住助理工作也是助学金的一种。

sent.orig: Any resident foreigner in the country must register in the Resident Foreigner Department.
sent.trans: 任何居住在该国的外国人必须到外籍人员居住管理部门登记注册。

sent.orig: Have you been permanently resident in the UK for the last three years?
sent.trans: 我想这点不会有太多人达到这个要求啊最后三年在英国的永久居民？
